text: 9.11-12: Stt 25.23Fhe Bakɨme, ana wo vuzvugar ana gumgi ndi fi. Ana gumgi mbui ŋaari ga ndɨkndɨgap mba tɨva mbui fhuvara. Ana nduara gumgir kaav mbe ndi fi. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, Rebeka ntigar mba kamani tɨrga. Mani vhɨra tɨvar vhuuaŋ muuŋgi fhu. Mani vhɨra tɨva mbatɨk thueŋ muuŋgi fhu. Fhe Bakɨme khaŋ Rebeka nzuai, “Ndu fhara ruagirga tar, ana ndu zumgum ruagirga tarar ŋaara guma kɨrga.”
